mapper.select:
select parent.id, parent. `name`, parent.parent_id, parent. `path`, parent. `level`, parent.created, parent.updated,
child.id as child_id, child. `name` as child_name, child.parent_id as child_parent_id, child. `path` as child_path, child. `level` as child_level, child.created as child_created, child.updated as child_updated from rights as parent left join rights as child on child.parent_id = parent.id where parent.parent_id = 0
